title: Nicodemus National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      The visitor center is located at 304 Washington Avenue in the 1939 Township Hall. It is free of charge. The visitor center is open during the summer (June 1st through September 1st) for six (6) days of the week. We are closed on Sundays. Hours for the center are 9:00 am to 4:30 pm CST.Due to our small number of staff, the Visitor Center may be temporarily closed around the lunch hour -- our staff will post the time you can expect for their return. Thank you for your understanding.Standard Summer HoursSunday: ClosedMonday: 9:00 AM - 4:30 PMTuesday: 9:00 AM - 4:30 PMWednesday: 9:00 AM - 4:30 PMThursday: 9:00 AM - 4:30 PMFriday: 9:00 AM - 4:30 PMSaturday: 9:00 AM - 4:30 PM  Â     Nicodemus Water Tower NPS photo by Jonathan Winskie
